title: Client for TGStat API
text: Функции пакета Устновка Авторизация Пример использования Опции пакета Переменные среды

title: Client for TGStat API
text: Пакет rtgstat включает в себя функции для работы со всеми методами TGStat Search API и TGStat Stat API. На данный момент в rtgstat доступны следующие функции, и соответствующие им методы API: tg_auth() - Авторизация tg_channel() - Получение информации о канале tg_channels_search() - Поиск каналов * tg_channel_stat() - Получение статистики канала tg_channel_posts() - Получение списка публикаций канала tg_channel_mentions() - Получение списка упоминаний tg_channel_forwards() - Получение списка репостов из канала tg_channel_subscribers() - Получение кол-ва подписчиков в динамике * tg_channel_views() - Получение кол-ва просмотров в динамике * tg_channel_avg_posts_reach() - Получение среднего охвата публикаций канала в динамике * tg_channel_err() - Получение показателя ERR для канала в динамике * tg_post() - Получение данных о публикации tg_post_stat() - Получение статистики публикации tg_posts_search() - Поиск публикаций * tg_mentions_by_period() - Динамика упоминания ключевого слова по периодам * tg_mentions_by_channels() - Упоминания ключевого слова в разрезе каналов * tg_categories() - Список категорий ** tg_languages() - Список языков ** tg_countries() - Список стран ** tg_api_usage() - Статистика запросов к API ** Звёздочкой * отмечены методы, доступные только на платных тарифах API. Двумя звёздами ** отмечаны методы, доступные на всех тарифах и не участвующие в тарификации.

title: Client for TGStat API
text: На данный момент пакет rtgstat можно устновить из CRAN: Или GitHub:
code: install.packages("rtgstat") # install.packages("devtools") devtools::install_github("selesnow/rtgstat")

title: Client for TGStat API
text: Для прохождения авторизации вам необходимо активировать в своём профиле TGStat один из доступных тарифов TGStat API. Токен доступа к API Более подробно о токенах и работе с ними читай в официальной справке.

title: Client for TGStat API
text: Пример запроса данных из TGStat API:
code: library(rtgstat)  tg_auth('Ваш токен')  # Замените на ID вашего канала tg_set_channel_id('R4marketing')  # Статистика канала stat <- tg_channel_stat() subscribers <- tg_channel_subscribers() views <- tg_channel_views()  # Статистика публикации posts <- tg_channel_posts() post_stat <- tg_post_stat(post_id = posts$link[1]) post_views    <- post_stat$views post_forwards <- post_stat$forwards post_mentions <- post_stat$mentions  # Упоминания mentions_dinamics <- tg_mentions_by_period(query = 'Алексей Селезнёв') mentions_channels <- tg_mentions_by_channels(query = 'Алексей Селезнёв') mentions   <- mentions_channels$items m_channels <- mentions_channels$channels

title: Client for TGStat API
text: В пакете доступны следующие опции: tg.api_token - Позволяет задать API токен в рамках текущей сессии; tg.channel_id - Идентификатор канала в рамках сессии; tg.check_api_quote - Позволяет отключать проверку квоты API, по умолчанию TRUE, для отключения устновите FALSE; tg.api_quote_alert_rate - Задаёт порог предупреждений об израсходованной квоте API, по умолчанию значение 0.9, т.е. предупреждение будет отображаться если вы израсходовали какую то квоту API более чем на 90%; tg.max_tries - Позволяет задать количество повторных отправок запроса, в случае сбоя API; tg.interval - Позволяет задать паузу между повторными отправками запросов, по умолчанию пакет сам управляет паузами; tg.base_url - Базовый URL обращения к API, крайне не рекомендуется изменять данную опцию. Для установки каждой опции в rtgstat есть вспомогательная функция с именем заданным следующим щаблоном tg_set_имя_опции(значение_опции). Т.е. установить любую опцию можно двумя способами: Посмотреть текущие значения опций rtgstat можно с помощью функции tg_options():
code: tg_set_check_api_quote(FALSE) # тоже самое что и options(tg.check_api_quote = FALSE) tg_options()  rtgstat options: tg.api_token: <hidden> tg.base_url: https://api.tgstat.ru/ tg.max_tries: 1 tg.check_api_quote: TRUE tg.api_quote_alert_rate: 0.9

title: Client for TGStat API
text: Для удобства работы вы можете использовать переменные среды для установки значений по умолчанию: TG_API_TOKEN - Ваш токен доступа к TGStat API; TG_CHANNEL_ID - Идентификатор основного канала для работы с TGStat API. Прописать переменные среды можно в файле .Renviron, или использовать интерйес операционной системы.

title: Channel search — tg_channels_search
text: query Search keyword search_by_description Search channel description? country Channel geography (country). Use tg_countries get countries dictionary. language Channel content language. Use tg_languages get languages dictionary. category Channel category. Use tg_categories get categories dictionary. limit Maximum number channels response, 100.

what: Getting the average coverage of channel publications over time — tg_channel_avg_posts_reach

text: Allows get indicator "average coverage publications" dynamics days, weeks, months.

title: Getting the average coverage of channel publications over time — tg_channel_avg_posts_reach
code: tg_channel_avg_posts_reach(   channel_id = tg_get_channel_id(),   start_date = Sys.Date() - 15,   end_date = Sys.Date(),   group = c("day", "week", "month") )

title: Getting the average coverage of channel publications over time — tg_channel_avg_posts_reach
text: channel_id Channel ID (@username, t./username, t./joinchat/AAAAABbbbbcccc ... channel ID 'TGStat') start_date Start date report period end_date End date report period group Time group: day, week, month

title: Getting the average coverage of channel publications over time — tg_channel_avg_posts_reach
text: tibble post reach dinamics

title: Getting the average coverage of channel publications over time — tg_channel_avg_posts_reach
text: group = 'day' grouping, value "average coverage publications" end day returned. groupings group = 'week' group = 'month', value indicator "average coverage publications" end last day period (week month) returned. default, result returned last 10 days. However, can specify required period using start_date end_date parameters, observing restrictions tariff. Depending requested grouping type group - period field take one following formats: day: Y-m-d week: Y-W month: Y-m

code: if (FALSE) { tg_set_channel_id('R4marketing') post_reach <- tg_channel_avg_posts_reach() }

title: Keyword mentions by channel — tg_mentions_by_channels
text: method obtaining data mentions keyword / phrase grouped channel. Suitable tracking channels often write given topic, mention brand person Telegram publications. Returns information channel, number mentions, reach, date last mention keyword channel.

title: Keyword mentions by channel — tg_mentions_by_channels
code: tg_mentions_by_channels(   query,   peer_type = c("all", "channel", "chat"),   start_date = Sys.Date() - 15,   end_date = Sys.Date(),   hide_forwards = 0,   strong_search = 0,   minus_mords = NULL,   extended_syntax = 0 )

title: Keyword mentions by channel — tg_mentions_by_channels
text: query Search query peer_type Source type (channel, chat, ) start_date Published date (timestamp) end_date Date published (timestamp) hide_forwards Hide reposts search results strong_search Enable strict search (disables morphology search part word) minus_mords List negative words (separator - space) extended_syntax Whether request uses extended query syntax, see details

title: Keyword mentions by channel — tg_mentions_by_channels
text: list

title: Keyword mentions by channel — tg_mentions_by_channels
text: Keyword / phrase search methods support extended query syntax. must pass extendedSyntax parameter (extended_syntax newer API methods) indicate parser search query contains statements extended query language. Morphology: Regardless form used word query, default morphological forms taken account (case, singular plural). , request mom also find publications mom, mom, mom, mom, etc. found. change behavior, must use = operator. Exact occurrence word. Operator = = operator front word tells analyzer given word searched exact match transmitted one. query =mom find posts word mom. Publications containing words mum, mum, mum, mum text found. Search multiple words transferring several words separated spaces search query, publications found words occurs time. request mom dad find publications text words appear simultaneously order case, distance . operator | need find publications least one words occurs, must use operator |. Request Mom | dad find publications text least one words found. Search phrase. Operator "" query mama washed frame, enclosed double quotes, sets strict word order, explaining analyzer needs find entire phrase passed. publications found three words appear side side order specified request. Publications containing words word forms submitted also found. change behavior, must use = operator. query = "mama soap frame" find publications three words appear side side order case indicated query. Using negative keywords. Operator - Using operator - can specify words appear text publication. query "mama soap" -frame show publications contain phrases mummy soap, mummy washed, ..., contain words frame, frame, etc. Grouping words. Operator () Using parentheses search query allows group parts query make complex combinations using operators described . query (mom | dad | brother | sister) (soap | painted) (frame | door) find publications text least one word word group necessarily found. . publications found containing: mom washed frame, dad washed frame, sister painted door, etc. query (mom | dad) (dyed) - (frame | door | hair) find publications, text must contain least one words first group mom, dad, must contain word second group painted, dyed, dyed, contains words last group frame, door, hair. can practice writing search queries publication search tool (forget check "Advanced language" checkbox enable advanced query syntax mode).

title: Keyword mentions by channel — tg_mentions_by_channels
text: See also TGStat API Documentation metrod words/mentions--period

title: Keyword mentions by channel — tg_mentions_by_channels
code: if (FALSE) { mentions_data <- tg_mentions_by_channels(     query = 'Alexey Seleznev',     start_date = '2021-09-01',     end_date = '2021-09-30' )  mentions <- mentions_data$items channels <- mentions_data$channels }

title: Dynamics of the keyword mentions by period — tg_mentions_by_period
text: query Search query peer_type Source type (channel, chat, ) start_date Published date (timestamp) end_date Date published (timestamp) group Time group: day, week, month hide_forwards Hide reposts search results strong_search Enable strict search (disables morphology search part word) minus_mords List negative words (separator - space) extended_syntax Whether request uses extended query syntax, see details

title: Dynamics of the keyword mentions by period — tg_mentions_by_period
text: tibble mention statistics

title: Dynamics of the keyword mentions by period — tg_mentions_by_period
text: Keyword / phrase search methods support extended query syntax. must pass extendedSyntax parameter (extended_syntax newer API methods) indicate parser search query contains statements extended query language. Morphology: Regardless form used word query, default morphological forms taken account (case, singular plural). , request mom also find publications mom, mom, mom, mom, etc. found. change behavior, must use = operator. Exact occurrence word. Operator = = operator front word tells analyzer given word searched exact match transmitted one. query =mom find posts word mom. Publications containing words mum, mum, mum, mum text found. Search multiple words transferring several words separated spaces search query, publications found words occurs time. request mom dad find publications text words appear simultaneously order case, distance . operator | need find publications least one words occurs, must use operator |. Request Mom | dad find publications text least one words found. Search phrase. Operator "" query mama washed frame, enclosed double quotes, sets strict word order, explaining analyzer needs find entire phrase passed. publications found three words appear side side order specified request. Publications containing words word forms submitted also found. change behavior, must use = operator. query = "mama soap frame" find publications three words appear side side order case indicated query. Using negative keywords. Operator - Using operator - can specify words appear text publication. query "mama soap" -frame show publications contain phrases mummy soap, mummy washed, ..., contain words frame, frame, etc. Grouping words. Operator () Using parentheses search query allows group parts query make complex combinations using operators described . query (mom | dad | brother | sister) (soap | painted) (frame | door) find publications text least one word word group necessarily found. . publications found containing: mom washed frame, dad washed frame, sister painted door, etc. query (mom | dad) (dyed) - (frame | door | hair) find publications, text must contain least one words first group mom, dad, must contain word second group painted, dyed, dyed, contains words last group frame, door, hair. can practice writing search queries publication search tool (forget check "Advanced language" checkbox enable advanced query syntax mode).

title: Search publications — tg_posts_search
text: Method searching publications keyword. Returns publications, sorted reverse chronological order (recent top), search text found.

title: Search publications — tg_posts_search
code: tg_posts_search(   query,   peer_type = c("all", "channel", "chat"),   start_date = Sys.Date() - 15,   end_date = Sys.Date(),   hide_forwards = 0,   hide_deleted = 0,   strong_search = 0,   minus_mords = NULL,   extended_syntax = 0 )

title: Search publications — tg_posts_search
text: query Search query peer_type Source type (channel, chat, ) start_date Published date (timestamp) end_date Date published (timestamp) hide_forwards Hide reposts search results hide_deleted Hide deleted posts strong_search Enable strict search (disables morphology search part word) minus_mords List negative words (separator - space) extended_syntax Whether request uses extended query syntax, see details

title: Search publications — tg_posts_search
text: list two tibbles

title: Search publications — tg_posts_search
text: Keyword / phrase search methods support extended query syntax. must pass extendedSyntax parameter (extended_syntax newer API methods) indicate parser search query contains statements extended query language. Morphology: Regardless form used word query, default morphological forms taken account (case, singular plural). , request mom also find publications mom, mom, mom, mom, etc. found. change behavior, must use = operator. Exact occurrence word. Operator = = operator front word tells analyzer given word searched exact match transmitted one. query =mom find posts word mom. Publications containing words mum, mum, mum, mum text found. Search multiple words transferring several words separated spaces search query, publications found words occurs time. request mom dad find publications text words appear simultaneously order case, distance . operator | need find publications least one words occurs, must use operator |. Request Mom | dad find publications text least one words found. Search phrase. Operator "" query mama washed frame, enclosed double quotes, sets strict word order, explaining analyzer needs find entire phrase passed. publications found three words appear side side order specified request. Publications containing words word forms submitted also found. change behavior, must use = operator. query = "mama soap frame" find publications three words appear side side order case indicated query. Using negative keywords. Operator - Using operator - can specify words appear text publication. query "mama soap" -frame show publications contain phrases mummy soap, mummy washed, ..., contain words frame, frame, etc. Grouping words. Operator () Using parentheses search query allows group parts query make complex combinations using operators described . query (mom | dad | brother | sister) (soap | painted) (frame | door) find publications text least one word word group necessarily found. . publications found containing: mom washed frame, dad washed frame, sister painted door, etc. query (mom | dad) (dyed) - (frame | door | hair) find publications, text must contain least one words first group mom, dad, must contain word second group painted, dyed, dyed, contains words last group frame, door, hair. can practice writing search queries publication search tool (forget check "Advanced language" checkbox enable advanced query syntax mode).

code: if (FALSE) { post_search <- tg_posts_search(     query = 'rtgstat package',     peer_type = 'channel',     start_date = '2021-11-01',     end_date = '2021-11-31' )  search_result <- post_search$items channels <- post_search$channels  }

title: rtgstat 0.2.1
text: CRAN release: 2021-12-22 CRAN fixes.

title: rtgstat 0.2.0
text: tg_channel_avg_posts_reach() - Getting average coverage channel publications time. tg_channel_err() - Obtaining ERR indicator channel dynamics. tg_set_check_api_quote() - Enable disable API limit rate alerts.

title: rtgstat 0.2.0
text: tg.check_api_quote - allows disable api quota check.

title: rtgstat 0.2.0
text: Fixed bug tg_set_channel_id(): object 'tg_channel_id' found. Fixed API quote parser tg_api_usage().

title: rtgstat 0.2.0
text: rtgstat added TGStat API documentation. mechanism retrying request case error rewritten standard means httr2, using req_retry(). Add user agent request tg_make_request() req_user_agent(). Now API endpoint add URL req_url_path_append() inside tg_make_request(). Disabled checking api quota usage tg_categories(), tg_countries(), tg_languages(). retry removed rtgstat dependencies.

title: rtgstat 0.1.1
text: CRAN release: 2021-11-29 Fixed errors DESCRIPTION CRAN.

title: rtgstat 0.1.0
text: Added NEWS.md file track changes package.
